CustomField.inlineHelpText: Describe factors that may affect the choice of employer and profession. It can be geographical obstacles, transport, family situation and housing or other. Personal data about third parties, such as names, contact details or other personal data, must not be registered. Example 1 "You have a difficult living situation that affects your health and ability to work, as well as the opportunity to work where you want."
CustomField.label: Environmental conditions
